core_meaning: Conjunction between Mercury and Venus fuses in intensification. Mercury: analysis, communication, commerce, learning, tech. Venus: affection, art, harmony, pleasure, values. General tenor: mixed; outcome depends on maturity, timing, and context.

facets.career: Negotiation, analytics, documentation, skilling.  Design, branding, client harmony, tasteful presentation. Emphasis: intensification.
facets.relationships: Dialog, problem-solving, curiosity.  Attraction, diplomacy, reciprocity. Emphasis: intensification.
facets.money: Trading, freelancing, multi-stream income, contracts.  Luxury/beauty revenues, pricing power via desirability. Emphasis: intensification.
facets.health_adj: Nervous system, breath, routine mobility.  Glucose balance, skin, reproductive health; moderation. Emphasis: intensification.

risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.
People-pleasing → scope creep; set clear give-and-get.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: intensification).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: intensification).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: intensification).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: intensification).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: intensification).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Venus: design, harmonize, price; tone: intensification).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.
